body:
similar issue here, I had a down vote brigade got to -5 and its been stuck there for days despite being in the positive since. sent an email and a pair of posts about it in +ruqqus and +askruqqus 

got some tips on curbing it in the future but no resolution or explination.

I also don't delete comments, ever.  my opinion is my opinion deleting it doesn't change that.  though i will edit if i'm wrong leaving my original comment so people see where i made my mistake and maybe learn from it if they had the same thoughts :-)
body_html:
similar issue here, I had a down vote brigade got to -5 and its been stuck there for days despite being in the positive since. sent an email and a pair of posts about it in +Ruqqus and +AskRuqqus

got some tips on curbing it in the future but no resolution or explination.

I also don't delete comments, ever. my opinion is my opinion deleting it doesn't change that. though i will edit if i'm wrong leaving my original comment so people see where i made my mistake and maybe learn from it if they had the same thoughts :-)

similar issue here, I had a down vote brigade got to -5 and its been stuck there for days despite being in the positive since. sent an email and a pair of posts about it in +ruqqus and +askruqqus 

got some tips on curbing it in the future but no resolution or explination.

I also don't delete comments, ever.  my opinion is my opinion deleting it doesn't change that.  though i will edit if i'm wrong leaving my original comment so people see where i made my mistake and maybe learn from it if they had the same thoughts :-)

post.title: Is Ruqqus having issues with rep?

body:
I'm pretty sure the whole count is borked.

If I go through my posts and comments and add up the scores it doesn't even come close to my actual rep score total. 

I've got most of my posts generally showing a score of between 1 and 10 but they aren't the real numbers apparently.

It's hard to tell which content is better received at the moment.

Also, about two weeks ago I hit 500 rep then the next day it was down to around 300 and never went back up but posts since then have added to the 300 number.

Today I was nearing 500 again and just looked and I'm down to low 400s without making any posts for a couple of days

body:
I had 833 rep when I went to eat lunch (about 1200 EST). When I came back at 12:40, I had 676 rep---a loss of 157 rep points. Even if I have posted 157 times, which I doubt, my account is set to private so you can't just go in and down vote everything I've ever posted. Out of curiosity, I clicked on some other user names, found one that is also set to private, and tried to find their post history. It's not possible. Therefore, it's not a brigade attempt to discredit me. It's has to be a glitch. 

Also, searched for a way to ask for help, and there is none. 

And I'm really fucking sad about it. I was getting so close to my 1000 rep goal :( 

BTW, I have a screenshot of the 833 reps, in case someone wants to look into it for me (lol)
body_html:
I had 833 rep when I went to eat lunch (about 1200 EST). When I came back at 12:40, I had 676 rep---a loss of 157 rep points. Even if I have posted 157 times, which I doubt, my account is set to private so you can't just go in and down vote everything I've ever posted. Out of curiosity, I clicked on some other user names, found one that is also set to private, and tried to find their post history. It's not possible. Therefore, it's not a brigade attempt to discredit me. It's has to be a glitch.

Also, searched for a way to ask for help, and there is none.

And I'm really fucking sad about it. I was getting so close to my 1000 rep goal :(

BTW, I have a screenshot of the 833 reps, in case someone wants to look into it for me (lol)

parent.body:
I had 833 rep when I went to eat lunch (about 1200 EST). When I came back at 12:40, I had 676 rep---a loss of 157 rep points. Even if I have posted 157 times, which I doubt, my account is set to private so you can't just go in and down vote everything I've ever posted. Out of curiosity, I clicked on some other user names, found one that is also set to private, and tried to find their post history. It's not possible. Therefore, it's not a brigade attempt to discredit me. It's has to be a glitch. 

Also, searched for a way to ask for help, and there is none. 

And I'm really fucking sad about it. I was getting so close to my 1000 rep goal :( 

BTW, I have a screenshot of the 833 reps, in case someone wants to look into it for me (lol)
parent.body_html:
I had 833 rep when I went to eat lunch (about 1200 EST). When I came back at 12:40, I had 676 rep---a loss of 157 rep points. Even if I have posted 157 times, which I doubt, my account is set to private so you can't just go in and down vote everything I've ever posted. Out of curiosity, I clicked on some other user names, found one that is also set to private, and tried to find their post history. It's not possible. Therefore, it's not a brigade attempt to discredit me. It's has to be a glitch.

Also, searched for a way to ask for help, and there is none.

And I'm really fucking sad about it. I was getting so close to my 1000 rep goal :(

BTW, I have a screenshot of the 833 reps, in case someone wants to look into it for me (lol)
